newsitem.title: JAPAN: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.
newsitem.headline: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.

text.p: Kobe rubber futures were mixed in the after-hours session on Monday, on light technical orders from local investors, traders said.
Prices ranged from 0.2 yen per kg lower to 0.3 yen higher than the day's close. Benchmark March was up 0.3 yen at 136.2.

Traders said the spot October contract's expiry this Friday will be a major market factor in the near term. "We expect individual investors to adjust positions throughout this week," a brokerage house trader said.
Bumper rubber stocks in Japan are likely to cap the topside for a while, they said.
